name: Unit 1 (Prototype)
description:
Unit 1

Quick mock up of a "Walker" inspired shooty game. Never did take the animations from blender and into the game, so the walker doesn't walk... kind of defeating the point.

Tested out using a curved invisible background mesh used to point the walkers head towards it with the mouse pointer.

How to play - Aim at things and hold left mouse button to fire.

In case you're wondering, there is no win condition. Sorry.

Novonium game demo - https://novomundus.itch.io/novonium
